features: SheaMoisture Hydrate and Repair is a deep conditioner and rinse-out conditioner that softens, detangles and infuses damaged hair with intensive moisture for hair repair.
This deep hair conditioner smooths rough, dry cuticles and seals for split end repair; use this damaged hair treatment to restore vitality to dull, lackluster hair for healthy hair that lasts.
Work conditioner through damaged hair from roots to ends, leave on for up to 3 minutes or longer as a deep conditioning treatment, then rinse or use daily as a cleansing conditioner.
Made with Manuka Honey, Yogurt Extract, Mafura Oil, this shea conditioner, damaged hair treatment and conditioner for curly hair leaves hair feeling stronger and more resilient.
This conditioner for hair keeps damaged hair and natural hair healthy and has been tested on our family for generations and never on animals, use as a moisturizing hair treatment.
body.description: SheaMoisture’s Manuka Honey & Yogurt Hydrate + Repair Conditioner with Mafura & Baobab Oils softens, detangles and instantly infuses abused hair with intensive moisture. Formulated with certified organic Shea Butter, reparative Manuka Honey and Yogurt in an ultra-hydrating conditioner that smoothes rough, dry cuticles, fights splits ends and restores vitality to dull, lack-luster hair. Leaves hair feeling stronger and more resilient. Work conditioner through damaged hair from roots to ends, leave on for up to 3 minutes or longer as a deep conditioning treatment, then rinse or use daily as a cleansing conditioner. Use this hair treatment for damaged hair as an anti frizz conditioner or as a conditioner for curly hair. This conditioner for hair keeps damaged hair and natural hair healthy and has been tested on our family for generations and never on animals, use as a moisturizing hair treatment. Our STORY: Sofi Tucker started selling Shea Nuts at the village market in Bonthe, Sierra Leone in 1912. By age 19, the widowed mother of four was selling Shea Butter, African Black Soap and her homemade hair and skin preparations all over the countryside. Sofi Tucker was our Grandmother and SheaMoisture is her legacy. With this purchase you help empower disadvantaged women to realize a brighter, healthier future.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hydrate + Repair Conditioner This rinse-out conditioner instantly detangles while infusing hair with intensive moisture, reconstructive proteins and shine-enhancing nutrients. Formulated with certified organic Shea Butter, ultra-moisturizing Manuka Honey and Yogurt in a reparative formula to condition and smooth dry cuticles, resulting in reduced frizz and breakage prevention.
Manuka Honey & Yogurt Work conditioner through hair from root to ends. Leave on for 3 minutes, then rinse. Style as desired. For best results use after cleansing with our Hydrate + Repair Shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing and Love the smell
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my hair feeling amazing and rinses out quickly. No buildup and smells amazing. All four of my kids and I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very thick and the smell is strong but it's not a bad scent.
reviews.reviewText: The only that I wish was different was that it wasn't in a hand pump. It's thick and luxurious and it takes 17 pumps to give me the amount I want for my hair. Would much rather have a tube to squeeze out. Other than that this stuff works great on my hair. I think I found my new conditioner. Waiting for the shampoo to give a review too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells like old lady perfume.
reviews.reviewText: I wish it didn't have the scent it does because it works really well. It's made with mostly good and natural ingredients(not chemicals). It gets a high rating on the Yuka app but I can't stand the way it smells. If the whole old lady perfume smell is you jam by all means buy these up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very light fragrance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My hair is constantly improving! Partially due to this!
reviews.reviewText: A few months in using this on my long curly hair! It is an absolutely is a game changer. I started loosely following the curly girl method and my hair has grown so much and all of the hair I lost from psoriasis being on my scalp for so long is coming back due to using better products. My hair is constantly getting better and I’m so close to my goal of bum length hair! I think it’ll be maybe a year or two more before it gets there. My baby hairs are all getting to ear lobe length tho so they are also growing fast! Thank goodness for people who actually know stuff about hair on the internet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells amazing, my hair feels nice. Packaging looks like 5+ years old and like it was chucked at the wall a couple times and sent just like that with a broken pump but hey I love the brand and I’ll always support them because this brand has done WONDERS for my hair 🤍🤍🫶🏼

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2019
reviews.reviewText: This has really helped to smooth and relax my frizzy hair. This conditioner has been a life saver since I started using it. My hair has a mixture of different curl types but nothing too curly and might be considered more wavy. However, I have a very frizzy top layer of hair. This conditioner has solved all my frizzy and dry problems. When I blow dry I can get away without straightening it if I want and I can actually let my hair air dry and have a similar texture throughout now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I'm using this produc there are very longtemps. I love it. I recommend this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good product and so well wrapped thank you

I saw someone on here say that the scent of this is sort of like an old lady smell and I have to agree haha. My main complaint though is that this doesn’t distribute well on wet hair, like at all, so you need to use a lot of it compared to any other moisturizer I’ve ever used.

The bottle was sent with tape wrapped tightly around the pump that was near impossible to get off. Once it was off I realized the pump was damaged and they shipped it anyway. The pump doesn’t work at all. Not impressed at all with the seller.
